postfull_jsx.the_rules_of_APP_NAME:
The first rule of {APP_NAME} is: Do not lose your password.
The second rule of {APP_NAME} is: Do not lose your password.
The third rule of {APP_NAME} is: We cannot recover your password.
The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
The seventh rule: Always back up your password.
postfull_jsx.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file
postfull_jsx.understand_that_APP_NAME_cannot_recover_: I understand that {APP_NAME} cannot recover lost passwords
postfull_jsx.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
postfull_jsx.password_must_be_characters_or_more: Password must be {amount} characters or more
postfull_jsx.you_need_private_password_or_key_not_a_p: You need a private password or key (not a public key)
postfull_jsx.if_you_did_not_make_this_change: If you did not make this change please
postfull_jsx.i_understand_dont_show_again: I understand, don't show me again

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact t@cyber.fund for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on {APP_URL} if the account owner had perviously listed '{APP_NAME}' as their account trustee and complied with {APP_NAME}'s Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Please login with {provider} to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun:
Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using {APP_NAME}'s blockchain-based multi factor authentication.

We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails.

Please be prepared to verify your identity.

Regards,

Ned Scott

CEO Steemit
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.
